name: Space betrayers (itch)
description:
Space betrayers

The stars are in a weird position today, i feel like something can happen. Meanwhile in space:

All of the old space games have come together to fight against you. Avoid the bullets, asteroids and space ships at all cost.  Use your mouse to move the space agent across the screen. A pixel-art artstyle combined with a chiptune soundtrack makes you ready for a nostalgic 1-bit experience!

Info

This game is made in 2 days for the 1-bit Weekend #2 game jam.
I used the theme astrology.

Art, design, programming, sound effects and music is made by me.
Programs used: Unity, Soundtrap, Pixilart.
Pixeltext: Pixelfont - trpifive from the unity aset store.

Do you have suggestions, improvements and/or feedback? Leave it in the comments.
